parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project. You can obtain the name of the project from the response of the [CreateProject](~~478153~~) operation.

parameters.name: RequestDefinition
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return original request parameters specified to create the task.

*   true
*   false (default)

This parameter applies only to the following tasks:

*   MediaConvert
*   VideoLabelClassification
*   FaceClustering
*   FileCompression
*   ArchiveFileInspection
*   FileUncompression
*   PointCloudCompress
*   ImageToPDF
*   StoryCreation
*   LocationDateClustering
*   ImageSplicing
*   FacesSearching

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the task. You can obtain the ID of a task after you create the task.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description: The type of the task. For information about valid values, see [Task types](~~2743993~~).
